author: tv
msg: Move setting of the primaryKeyMethodInfo from generation time to runtime which should allow changing the database adapter at runtime without re-creating the OM classes. Would please someone with access to a DB which uses sequences (Postgres, Oracle etc) check if this works for him, too. Fixes TORQUE-95

author: tv
msg: Fix JDK 1.3 compatibility for generated classes

author: tv
msg: Make relative xsl:includes work again, lift the brake for template compiles (no synchronization anymore)
